entry.tran: (尤指海员在暴风雨时戴的)防水帽(其后沿较宽可防水护颈)
entry.def: A sou'wester is a waterproof hat that is worn especially by sailors in stormy weather. It has a wide brim at the back to keep your neck dry.

means.word_mean: 1. a strong wind from the southwest
2. waterproof hat with wide slanting brim longer in back than in front

auth_sentence.content: When a woman at a party refers to a real sou'wester, the narrator replies, I'm from the Mi'est.
auth_sentence.res_content: When a woman at a party refers to a real sou'wester, the narrator replies, I'm from the Mi'est.
